headline: Ask HN: Has a corporate engineering blog made you want to join the company?
description:
Dan Luu wrote this fascinating post a while back (https://danluu.com/corp-eng-blogs/), proposing, "Companies compete relatively directly when recruiting, so being more compelling relative to another company has value to them; replicating the playbook Cloudflare or Segment has used with their engineering 'brands' would be a significant recruiting advantage."

Have you applied to work at a company after reading its engineering blog?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 企业工程博客是否让你想加入公司？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 企業工程博客是否讓你想加入公司？
